summary.span: 表示為 的條件約束 (Constraint) 集合。

span.span: Represents a collection of constraints for a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 透過存取屬性。The is accessed through the property. 可以同時包含這兩者並物件。The can contain both and objects for the . A物件可確保在特定的資料行中的資料永遠是唯一以保持資料完整性。A object makes sure that data in a specific column is always unique to preserve the data integrity. 判斷所發生的狀況中相關資料表的時機中的資料更新或刪除。The determines what will occur in related tables when data in the is either updated or deleted. 例如，如果資料列遭到刪除，會決定相關的資料列是否也要刪除 (cascade) 或其他採取的動作。For example, if a row is deleted, the will determine whether the related rows are also deleted (a cascade), or some other course of action. > [!NOTE] > 當您將加入會建立兩個資料表之間的關聯性，這兩個和會自動建立。When you add a that creates a relationship between two tables to a , both a and a are created automatically. 套用至父主要索引鍵資料行，並將條件約束加入該資料表的。The is applied to the primary key column in the parent , and the constraint is added to that table's . 套用至主索引鍵資料行和外部索引鍵資料行和條件約束加入至子資料表的。The is applied to the primary key column and the foreign key column, and the constraint is added to the child table's . 會使用標準集合方法時，這類， ，和。The uses standard collection methods such as , , and . 颾魤 ㄛ方法可用來尋找特定的條件約束，在集合中是否存在。In addition, the method can be used to look for the existence of a particular constraint in the collection. A時，會建立具有其屬性設定為`true`新增至物件的。A is created when a with its property set to `true` is added to a object's . A時，會建立新增至物件的。A is created when a is added to a object's . ## Examples 第一個範例會建立，並新增(使用其屬性設定為`true`) 以。The first example creates a , and adds a (with its property set to `true`) to the . 第二個範例會建立中，兩個物件、 四個資料行和。The second example creates a , two objects, four columns, and a . 條件約束的計數，就會顯示列印並時，會建立加入至物件的。The count of constraints is then printed to show that a and a are created when a is added to the object's . [!code-csharp[Classic WebData ConstraintCollection Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData ConstraintCollection Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData ConstraintCollection Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData ConstraintCollection Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

param.name: constraints
param.span: 要加入至集合中之 物件的陣列。

span.span: An array of objects to add to the collection.

summary.span: 將指定的 陣列元素複製到集合的末端。

span.span: Copies the elements of the specified array to the end of the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果已呼叫`AddRange`未將任何物件加入至集合，直到呼叫。If has been called, `AddRange` does not add any objects to the collection until is called. 當時所`EndInit`是呼叫，集合會填入最新的呼叫中指定的項目`AddRange`。At the time that `EndInit` is called, the collection will be populated with the items specified in the most recent call to `AddRange`. 如果`AddRange`多次呼叫內`BeginInit` / `EndInit`排序時，只有最新的呼叫中指定這些項目`AddRange`加入。If `AddRange` is called multiple times within a `BeginInit` / `EndInit` sequence, only those items specified in the most recent call to `AddRange` are added. ## Examples 下列範例會建立主要與外部索引鍵條件約束，並將其加入。The following example creates primary and foreign key constraints, and adds them to the . [!code-csharp[Classic WebData ConstraintCollection.AddRange Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData ConstraintCollection.AddRange Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData ConstraintCollection.AddRange Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData ConstraintCollection.AddRange Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

span.span: if the can be removed from collection; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 預設行為每當新增至，是要加入父資料表和到子資料表。The default behavior whenever a is added to a , is to add a to the parent table and a to the child table. 套用至父資料表中，主索引鍵資料行和套用至子資料表的外部索引鍵資料行。The is applied to the primary key column of the parent table, and the is applied to the foreign key column of the child table. 因為嘗試移除移除之前，先擲回的例外狀況原因，您應該一律使用方法，然後再呼叫 Remove，以確保能夠可以移除。Because trying to remove the before removing the causes an exception to be thrown, you should always use the method before calling Remove, to make sure that the can be removed. ## Examples 下列範例會使用方法，以判斷是否可加以移除，然後再嘗試將它移除。The following example uses the method to determine whether a can be removed, before trying to remove it. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData ConstraintCollection.CanRemove Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData ConstraintCollection.CanRemove Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData ConstraintCollection.CanRemove Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData ConstraintCollection.CanRemove Example/VB/source.vb#1)]
